name: Inferno Terminator
description:
Go on a mission to save the forest and villages from being burnt down.

In this 4 Player co-op game you will help to extinguish the fire from the ground, the air and the water or support the ground troup by cutting down trees.
Can you terminate the fatal inferno?

Controller recommended.
Control sticks move the player and directs the water.
Right trigger interacts.
